summary: Three themes: Ebony Dragon, Red Dragon & Gold Dragon.
descriptionHtml:
After making this: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=241
I received a few requests, to make dark dragon armor specifically and to make a skin that matches with the ebony armor, so this is what I made!

These skins are for both male and female characters.

There are three versions:
The Ebony Dragon reskin - it has patterns taken from the ebony armor on it and it has the same color scheme as the ebony armor. I created this one to fit with the ebony armour set when mixed/matched with it.
The Red Dragon - The iron is a strong red color and the fur is a faint red. the breastplate is red too.
The Gold Dragon - The iron has golden paint on it, everything else is black like the ebony set, but it has no patterns taken from the ebony armor on it.
_________
Download - Pick one of the three skins, then download the corresponding file (Red Dragon Armour file for the red set etc.) then read the readme file for installation.

_________
Note - This is a RE-TEXTURE of the dragon bone armour, this means installing one of these skins will make every dragon bone armour set look like this. This is not a unique item to find in-game.
Dragon Armour can be crafted with 100 Smithing skill and Dragon Bones + Scales.
author: Skals1
